test.name: StandardCase1
test.expression: case when 10 > 5 then 5 when 5 > 10 then 10 else null end

test.name: StandardCase2
test.expression: case when 5 > 10 then 5 + 10 when 5 = 10 then 10 else 10 - 5 end

test.name: StandardCase3
test.expression: case when null ~ 10 then null + 10 when null ~ 5 then 5 else 5 + 10 end

test.name: SelectedCase1
test.expression: case 5 when 5 then 12 when 10 then 10 + 5 else 10 - 5 end

test.name: SelectedCase2
test.expression: case 10 when 5 then 12 when 10 then 10 + 5 else 10 - 5 end

test.name: SelectedCase3
test.expression: case 10 + 5 when 5 then 12 when 10 then 10 + 5 else 10 - 5 end
